mapper.select: select film.film_name as filmName, info.film_en_name as filmEnName, film.img_address as imgAddress, info.film_score as score, info.film_score_num as scoreNum, film.film_box_office as totalBox, (select group_concat(show_name separator ',') from cat_dict_t where find_in_set(cat_dict_t.UUID, (select replace(trim(both '#' from film_cats), '#', ',') from film_t where film_t.UUID = film.UUID))) as info1, concat((select show_name from source_dict_t where source_dict_t.UUID = film.UUID ), '/', info.film_length, '分钟') as info02, concat(film.film_time, (select show_name from source_dict_t where film_source = source_dict_t.UUID), '上映') as info03 from film_t film, film_info_t info where film.UUID = info.film_id and film.film_name like #{filmName}

select film.film_name as filmName, info.film_en_name as filmEnName, film.img_address as imgAddress, info.film_score as score, info.film_score_num as scoreNum, film.film_box_office as totalBox, (select group_concat(show_name separator ',') from cat_dict_t where find_in_set(cat_dict_t.UUID, (select replace(trim(both '#' from film_cats), '#', ',') from film_t where film_t.UUID = film.UUID))) as info1, concat((select show_name from source_dict_t where source_dict_t.UUID = film.UUID ), '/', info.film_length, '分钟') as info02, concat(film.film_time, (select show_name from source_dict_t where film_source = source_dict_t.UUID), '上映') as info03 from film_t film, film_info_t info where film.UUID = info.film_id and film.UUID = #{uuid}
